thread.title: Anne Yeoman

author: Anne Yeoman
title: Anne Yeoman
text:
If our cats could have written this review, I am sure they would have asked Lesley and David to come back. They even prefered to sit on their laps when we returned!
The care they took with our cats extended to our house also. It was left as clean as we had left it and they even prepared a meal for our return. On top of all that they were absolutely charming. We would not hesitate to use them again.
